com.opengamma.strata.calc.config

Interface MarketDataRules

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllTargetsMarketDataRules, TypedMarketDataRules

    public interface MarketDataRules
    Market data rules specify what market data should be used when calculating measures for a target.

    For example, a calculation might require a USD discounting curve, but the system can contain multiple curve groups, each with a USD discounting curve. The market data rules allow the system to choose the correct curve.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MarketDataRules anyTarget(MarketDataMappings mappings)
      Returns a set of market data rules that match any target.
      default MarketDataRules composedWith(MarketDataRules... otherRules)
      Combines these rules with the specified rules.
      static MarketDataRules empty()
      Returns an empty set of rules.
      Optional<MarketDataMappings> mappings(CalculationTarget target)
      Returns the market data mappings that specify which market data should be used when performing calculations for the target.
      static MarketDataRules ofTargetTypes(MarketDataMappings mappings, Class<? extends CalculationTarget>... targetTypes)
      Returns set a of market data rules matching any target which is an instance of any of the target types.

    • Method Detail

      • ofTargetTypes

        @SafeVarargs
static MarketDataRules ofTargetTypes(MarketDataMappings mappings,
                                                   Class<? extends CalculationTarget>... targetTypes)
        Returns set a of market data rules matching any target which is an instance of any of the target types.
        Parameters:
        mappings - the market data mappings used for a target matching this set of rules
        targetTypes - types that targets must implement to in order to match this set of rules
        Returns:
        a market data rule that matches any target that is an instance of any of the target types

      • empty

        static MarketDataRules empty()
        Returns an empty set of rules.
        Returns:
        an empty set of rules

      • anyTarget

        static MarketDataRules anyTarget(MarketDataMappings mappings)
        Returns a set of market data rules that match any target.
        Parameters:
        mappings - the mappings used for any target passed to this set of rules
        Returns:
        a market data rule that matches any target

      • mappings

        Optional<MarketDataMappings> mappings(CalculationTarget target)
        Returns the market data mappings that specify which market data should be used when performing calculations for the target.
        Parameters:
        target - the target
        Returns:
        the mappings that specify which market data should be used when performing calculations for the target

      • composedWith

        default MarketDataRules composedWith(MarketDataRules... otherRules)
        Combines these rules with the specified rules.

        The resulting rules will return mappings from this set of rules if available, otherwise mappings will be returned from the other rules.

        Parameters:
        otherRules - the other rules
        Returns:
        the combined rules
